name: Dr. Sarah Thompson
title: Cardiologist
biography: Dr. Sarah Thompson is a leading cardiologist with over 15 years of experience in treating heart-related conditions. She is known for her compassionate care and expertise in both preventive and interventional cardiology.

certifications: Fellow of the American Heart Association
publications: The Impact of Diet on Heart Health
